Module com.example.mydmsproject
Package com.example.mydmsproject.model

Class Ball

java.lang.Object
com.example.mydmsproject.model.Sprite
com.example.mydmsproject.model.Ball
Direct Known Subclasses:
BonusBall, Buff
public class Ball extends Sprite
A Sprite class implements the main game element Ball, store lists of buffs/bonusBalls and total game score as well.
Author:
Tianxiang Song - modified
